rules_text:
[i](As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.)[/i]
When The Battle of Heroes enters, you may have target creature you control deal damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.
rules_text2:
{T}: Add {R}.
{1}{R}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Banks of Mustafar deals 2 damage to target opponent.
